eu_initiatives: New environment regulations, maritime safety issues as well as EU co-financing and funding initiatives (CEF) are the key topics being followed.

goals__remit:
Vision and strategy : 
Committed to the success of our customers. 
 
Continuous improvement of customer services and operational efficiency are key drivers of sustainable, profitable growth for DFDS. 
 
Development of digital capabilities is also key, and we are increasingly assessing and engaging with new business models and technologies. 
 
We also pursue shareholder value by leveraging our strong European platform through acquisitions.
